lead_paragraph: Under devastating air assault since the fall of Tunisia, the Italian outpost island of Pantelleria has now been attacked twice within forty-eight hours by Allied warships. Bombardment from the sea is almost invariably the final phase of the preparatory process that leads to invasion.
